examples.text: O zaman git dinlen, ne yakınıyorsun bana?
examples.translation: Then go rest, why are you complaining to me?

glosses: Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see o, zaman.

examples.text: Ben o zaman işte olacağım, gelemem.
examples.translation: I'm going to be at work at that time, I can't come.
